name: Build and Deploy Web App
objective: Create and deploy functional web applications from natural language descriptions using no-code AI generation
description: A comprehensive workflow for building complete web applications without writing code manually. Use Google AI Studio's Build tab to describe your app, generate the code, iterate through conversation, and deploy to Google Cloud Run with a public URLâ€”all within minutes.
time_saved: Eliminates hours of manual coding, setup, and deployment configuration (saves 2-8 hours per simple app)

tools_required.purpose: No-code web application generation and deployment platform

tasks.description: Open Google AI Studio and access the Build module for web app generation
Describe the web app in detail (e.g., 'create a coffee shop web app with menu and feedback form. Don't include pictures.')
Run generation and observe code assistant panel showing generation steps
Review live code preview, make adjustments via chat (e.g., 'Add a matcha latte to the menu')
Click deploy button for instant Google Cloud Run deployment with public URL

objects_created.description: Fully functional web app with live public URL on Cloud Run
Generated HTML, CSS, JavaScript code for the application
Live deployment link accessible to anyone

entry_criteria: Clear understanding of app requirements and features
Basic understanding of web app structure (pages, forms, navigation, etc.)
exit_criteria: All required features implemented and functional
App deployed to Cloud Run with public URL
Code reviewed and meets quality standards
Application tested and working as intended
use_cases: Create business landing pages with contact forms
Build restaurant/cafe menu websites with ordering
Build survey and feedback collection tools
typical_inputs: Data to display (menu items, products, services, etc.)
typical_outputs: Deployed application on Google Cloud Run
Code assistant logs showing generation steps
best_practices: Start with clear, detailed descriptions of all features needed
Specify 'Don't include pictures' if you plan to add images later to speed generation
Use iterative chat refinement for adjustments instead of regenerating entire app
Test application thoroughly in preview before deploying
Review generated code for security and best practices
Use specific examples in prompts (e.g., 'Add a matcha latte to the menu')
Keep initial app scope simple, then iterate to add complexity
Verify Cloud Run deployment settings before publishing
common_pitfalls: Overly complex initial prompts leading to generation errors
Not specifying enough detail, resulting in generic output
Requesting image generation which slows down the process
Not considering mobile responsiveness in initial description
Expecting enterprise-level features in simple no-code generation
Not reviewing code for security issues before public deployment
integration_with_other_workflows: WRF-021: Can create web apps featuring social media integration
Design workflows for mockups before building
API integration workflows for adding backend functionality

video_source.video_title: Google AI Studio Full Walkthrough and Tutorial
video_source.creator: AI for Grownups
